ui_modal_updaterequired_title: Wallpaper Engine needs to be updated
ui_modal_updaterequired_body:
Please close Wallpaper Engine (right click the tray icon and click Quit) and restart it over Steam to receive the latest updates. If you keep getting this warning, please verify the application files over Steam.

Application version: {{callerVersion}}, UI version: {{appVersion}}.
ui_modal_updateavailable_body_distro: A new update for Wallpaper Engine has been downloaded by Steam (version {{distroVersion}}). Would you like to restart Wallpaper Engine now to apply the update?
ui_modal_updateavailable_body_outdated:
It looks like you are trying to use the latest version of Wallpaper Engine on Windows 7 or 8.

Please switch to the beta named 'Windows 7 support' of Wallpaper Engine through the Steam game properties first.
ui_modal_installationpath_error_title: Wrong Installation Path registered in Windows
ui_modal_installationpath_error_body:
It looks like the program files of Wallpaper Engine have been moved after the installation. This breaks the auto start function and causes a number of problems.

You are currently running Wallpaper Engine from {{runPath}} but Steam has installed Wallpaper Engine to {{steamPath}}. The auto start needs to be updated to use Steam's correct installation path or this message will continue to appear.

Fix this now?
ui_modal_trial_version_start_body:
Thank you for trying Wallpaper Engine, we hope you will like our application. The trial will automatically expire after {{hrs}} hours of usage time.

Should you have any questions or run into any technical problems, please have a look at our help website as it covers almost all topics in great detail: help.wallpaperengine.io
ui_alert_connect_steam:
No first-time connection to Steam could be made

To remove this message forever: Make sure Steam is running and that you are logged into the correct Steam account and restart Wallpaper Engine. If you need help resolving this Steam issue, check our FAQ: Fix Steam Connection

If you do not own a legal copy of Wallpaper Engine: Please consider supporting our work. We have priced Wallpaper Engine very reasonably so that everyone can afford it. We have poured thousands of hours of work into this application and by buying Wallpaper Engine, you support its continued development, always receive the latest updates, help to pay for server costs and are able to download wallpapers via Steam with ease: Click here to buy Wallpaper Engine on Steam

This message will never appear again after you have started Wallpaper Engine through Steam once.
ui_browse_filter_content_preferences_too: You can click on the 'Steam Content Preferences' button below to adjust your overall age rating preferences for your Steam account.
ui_browse_grid_no_results:
No wallpapers found for your search.
Expand or reset the categories in the filter sidebar or try another search term.
ui_browse_grid_no_results_generic:
No results found for your search.
Expand or reset the categories in the filter sidebar or try another search term.
ui_browse_steam_status_complete_no_subsc: Steam failed to retrieve your subscriptions.
ui_browse_advertise_explore: Click here to discover new wallpapers from the Workshop!
ui_browse_advertise_workshop: Click here to search the Workshop in detail!
ui_browse_advertise_send_to_mobile: Click here to send this wallpaper to your mobile device!
ui_browse_no_service_body:
The Steam Workshop servers are currently not available. This is not a problem with Wallpaper Engine or your computer. Please wait a few hours and try again.

This is a Steam server problem and the Steam team is currently repairing the servers.
ui_browse_no_service_body_use_backup: Wallpaper Engine will now try to show an emergency backup until the Steam servers have been repaired by the Steam server team.
ui_browse_steam_offline_notice:
The Steam Workshop servers are offline. You are browsing an emergency backup from {{date}}.
This is not a problem with your computer or Wallpaper Engine. The Steam servers are currently being repaired and will be back online soon.
ui_browse_offline_error: Steam servers are offline. The Steam team is repairing the servers, please try again later.
ui_browse_gallery_block_info: {{count}} blocked wallpaper(s). Click here to view them.
ui_browse_details_local_editor_hint: Open this wallpaper in the editor to edit or delete it.
ui_browse_details_properties_reset_promp: Do you want to reset the current properties back to their defaults?
ui_browse_details_properties_preset_hint:
A Workshop preset includes all of your custom wallpaper settings and any images or videos you may have imported into the wallpaper.

You can publish them on the Steam Workshop just like regular wallpapers, allowing other users to experience the look and feel with the settings you have created. You can also download presets which other users have shared.
ui_browse_details_properties_apply_to_al: Apply to all Wallpapers and set Default Settings
Changes the default settings for all wallpapers on your current monitors or only changes these settings for the selected wallpapers.
Update all wallpapers and default settings
ui_browse_monitors_clone_hdr_hint: Windows may not support cloning from HDR to non-HDR displays.
ui_browse_monitors_clone_flip_limitation: At least one display must be the source display and cannot be flipped.
ui_browse_monitors_same_as_wallpaper_hin: The screensaver is configured to be the same as your active wallpapers. You can configure your screensavers separately from your wallpapers by enabling the option at the top.
ui_browse_monitors_configure_in_windows_: To use Wallpaper Engine as a screensaver, set it as the active screensaver in Windows.
ui_browse_modal_application_warning_body:
You are about to open an external application as a wallpaper:
{{filepath}}
Wallpaper Engine has no control over this file, you must ensure that it comes from a reliable source before proceeding.
ui_browse_modal_application_warning_disa: Don't ask again for this wallpaper
ui_browse_modal_unsubscribe_body:
Are you sure that you want to unsubscribe from: {{title}}?

After unsubscribing, Steam will delete the wallpaper files automatically after the wallpaper browse window is closed. Steam delays the deletion of wallpapers until you close the wallpaper browse window.
ui_browse_modal_unsubscribe_body_short: Are you sure that you want to unsubscribe from: {{title}}?
ui_browse_modal_remove_local_body: Are you sure that you want to remove the local wallpaper: {{title}}?
ui_browse_modal_remove_preset_info: The following presets are depending on the wallpaper(s) you are trying to unsubscribe and will be removed as well: {{presets}}
ui_browse_modal_subscribe_preset_body:
The wallpaper {{title}} is a preset for another wallpaper which you need to subscribe to as well to use it.

Subscribe to both now?
ui_browse_open_url_hotkey_info: To use your keyboard on the wallpaper, hide the icons with this hotkey first:
ui_browse_open_url_livestream_info: Enable Livestream Mode if the URL you are trying to load contains a video livestream. Some Wallpaper Engine features may not work properly in Livestream Mode.
ui_browse_open_url_livestream_warning:
Please Note: You are opening this URL using the alternative Edge WebView browser with a limited set of features, many Wallpaper Engine features might not work properly with Livestream Mode enabled.

You should only use this option if you intend to use a livestream as a wallpaper.
ui_browse_open_url_livestream_runtime_mo:
You need to install the Edge WebView web browser runtime before being able to use Livestream Mode. Do you want to install the runtime now?

You can also disable the Use Livestream Mode option in the URL settings instead.
ui_browse_modal_advertise_workshop_body:
Use the filter sidebar on the left to select tags that match your wallpaper preferences.

Use the Approved filter to browse hand-picked, high-quality wallpapers.

Set the sort order in the upper right corner to Most Popular or Top Rated if you are looking for high-quality submissions.
ui_browse_modal_advertise_workshop_anime: Wallpaper Engine contains a lot of Anime wallpapers. Do you want to see Anime wallpapers?
You can change this option any time by opening the filter settings again.
ui_browse_modal_resolution_settings_body: By choosing the Recommended option below, Wallpaper Engine will apply the optimal resolution filters for your system.
ui_browse_modal_resolution_settings_pixe: If you would like to see wallpapers that might not be a good match for your screen setup or if you are specifically looking to use pixel art wallpapers, you should enable All resolutions.
ui_browse_modal_resolution_settings_show: Turning this option off will hide all wallpapers with the Other resolution tag.
ui_browse_modal_screensaver_install_body: Do you want to install the Wallpaper Engine screensaver?
ui_browse_modal_screensaver_install_hint:
Most modern LCD and LED displays do not suffer from screen burn-in and you can safely use any wallpaper as a screensaver for aesthetic purposes.

If your display is based on a technology that is susceptible to screen burn-in (e.g. OLED, Plasma or CRT), we recommend using a wallpaper with regular motion and an overall dark theme, alternatively a wallpaper playlist also works well to protect your display.
ui_browse_modal_screensaver_install_erro:
Wallpaper Engine was unable to install the screensaver.

Make sure no anti-virus is restricting the program from installing the screensaver files.

Go here for more help: Fix Screensaver Installation
ui_browse_modal_windows_10_warning_messa:
The wallpaper {{title}} uses modern video features that require Windows 10 or newer and cannot be used on this computer.

Use the built-in Workshop to find new wallpapers while hiding incompatible wallpapers automatically.
ui_browse_playlist_empty: You have not created any playlists yet.
ui_browse_playlist_too_many_items: Too many wallpapers in the playlist to display.
ui_browse_playlist_modal_save_descriptio: If a playlist with the same name exists already, it will be overwritten.
ui_browse_playlist_modal_settings_video_: Change wallpaper when a video ends
ui_browse_playlist_modal_settings_update: Allow wallpaper to change while paused
ui_browse_playlist_modal_settings_begin_: Always begin with the first wallpaper
ui_browse_playlist_modal_settings_intro_: First wallpaper played at startup only
ui_browse_playlist_modal_settings_day_of: The Day of Week playlist does not support more than 7 wallpapers. Remove excess wallpapers now?
The Day of Week playlist does not support more than 7 wallpapers.
ui_browse_profiles_empty: You have not created any profiles yet.
ui_browse_profiles_modal_save_descriptio: If a profile with the same name exists already, it will be overwritten.
ui_browse_preset_modal_save_description: If a preset with the same name exists already, it will be overwritten.
ui_browse_preset_modal_empty: You have not created any presets for this wallpaper yet.
ui_browse_blocklist_empty: You have not blocked any users.
ui_browse_modal_no_steam_body:
Steam connection could not be initialized. Please try restarting Steam and Wallpaper Engine.

This problem is frequently caused by outdated Steam installations. Please make sure your Steam is up-to-date.

If you continue seeing this error, this means that your PC cannot correctly authenticate with the Steam servers, check your internet connection and whether you are logged into the correct Steam account.

An anti-virus or other types of security software could be preventing Steam and Wallpaper Engine from working together, try turning them off.

Check our support page for additional help: Fix Steam Connection
ui_browse_modal_no_steam_body_wrong_prov: You are running the Steam Edition of Wallpaper Engine in combination with a different version of Steam. Please restart Wallpaper Engine through Steam in order to access the Workshop for your specific version of the app. Alternatively, you can also log in to the correct Steam version for this edition of Wallpaper Engine.
ui_browse_query_error: Steam encountered an error, try again later: {{error}}
ui_browse_modal_safe_mode_body:
It looks like the program did not shut down correctly, the last wallpapers and plugins have not been loaded yet to prevent the issue from recurring.

Press OK to restore them now, or cancel to change them first.
ui_browse_explore_server_error: Cannot connect to Wallpaper Engine server to retrieve additional lists.
ui_browse_age_gate_modal_body: Please enter your birth date to continue:
ui_browse_age_gate_modal_sub: This data is for verification purposes only and will not be stored, uploaded or shared.
ui_browse_context_menu_mobile_type_not_s: Wallpaper type not supported on Android devices
ui_browse_report_modal_category_genre_de: You are reporting this wallpaper for using an incorrect genre tag. Please consider which genre matches the wallpaper best by choosing what you can 'see' not what you 'know' about this wallpaper personally.
ui_browse_report_modal_category_rating_d:
You are reporting this wallpaper for inappropriate nudity or violence.

For real-life nudity, real-life violence or any gross violations of the Steam Workshop content rules, please select the Ban option.

For animated or CGI content, select an appropriate age rating according to this table:
ui_browse_report_modal_category_copyrigh: Please use Steam's DMCA form to submit copyright violations, this will make sure it is dealt with in the legally correct manner.
ui_browse_report_modal_category_spam_des: You are reporting this wallpaper for spam by the author.
ui_browse_report_modal_category_offensiv: You are reporting this wallpaper for containing offensive content. Do not use this option to report nudity and instead choose the option 'wrong content rating'.
ui_browse_report_modal_category_other_de: Please choose the proper category before submitting your report! If it does not fit anywhere else, use this category.
ui_browse_report_modal_error: The report failed to be sent. The server might be offline, unreachable or undergoing maintenance. Try again later.
ui_browse_report_modal_error_401: The report failed to be sent. Your Steam game ticket seems to have expired. Please try restarting Steam and the wallpaper browser to get a new ticket.
ui_browse_modal_folder_remove_body: Are you sure that you want to remove this folder?
ui_browse_modal_folder_remove_unsubscrib: Unsubscribe or remove wallpapers in folder
ui_browse_download_missing_files: Missing files. Verify the program in Steam.
ui_browse_modal_seasonal_info_body:
We have changed the theme of Wallpaper Engine to match the occasion! The theme will be changed back in a couple of days.

You can disable seasonal theming in the settings if you don't like this or change the skin there any time.

The Discover tab also has a special list of wallpapers that match the time of the year!
ui_browse_modal_steam_redownload_error_b:
Wallpaper Engine has detected that a lot of your wallpapers are being downloaded by Steam right now.

If you have recently subscribed a lot of new wallpapers, then please ignore this message and wait for Steam to finish downloading everything.

If it looks like Steam is downloading a lot of wallpapers that you already downloaded before, then Steam has run into an error. This is not a bug in Wallpaper Engine. Please see this post Fix Steam re-downloading everything or wait for Steam to finish downloading and fix itself.
ui_browse_modal_monitor_mismatch_body:
It looks like Wallpaper Engine cannot apply the wallpaper because it cannot properly identify your monitors.

Try restarting Wallpaper Engine completely. If you frequently have this issue, try disabling the high priority auto start option and use the normal auto start instead.

Additionally, try setting the Monitor Identification option to Layout in the General tab of the settings to avoid this issue.
ui_browse_modal_trial_reminder_body:
The wallpapers you subscribed just now are really cool, aren't they? Purchase Wallpaper Engine now, you will get:

* Free to download all creative wallpapers.
* You will find new wallpapers every day from many content creators.
* Use the editor to create and publish your own wallpaper.
ui_browse_alert_active_application_rule: The application rule for {{executable}} is currently active and overriding your wallpaper selection.
ui_browse_alert_trial_reminder: Purchase Wallpaper Engine now and you will enjoy: easily downloading Workshop wallpapers including some exclusive ones on Steam.
ui_browse_alert_vram_exhausted: Your video memory is exhausted and the wallpapers have been disabled until your system has enough resources again. This feature can be turned off in the general settings.
ui_browse_alert_remote_steamdown: The Steam servers are currently experiencing technical issues and certain Workshop features may not work properly for you. This may include slow search response times or incomplete search results. This problem affects all Steam users and is unrelated to Wallpaper Engine or your computer. You can ignore this message if everything works well for you.
ui_browse_alert_screensaver_app: Application wallpapers cannot be used as a screensaver.
ui_browse_mobile_devices_qr_hint: Install Wallpaper Engine on your Android phone or tablet for free and use your animated wallpapers on the go.
ui_browse_mobile_devices_pin_hint: Enter this PIN on your mobile device to connect it:
ui_browse_mobile_devices_download_info: Right-click on compatible wallpapers and select Send to Mobile Device to wirelessly transfer your wallpapers to your phone or tablet.
ui_browse_mobile_devices_link_info: Visit our website for additional assistance: Wallpaper Engine on Mobile Help
ui_browse_mobile_upload_modal_hint: Wallpaper Engine will optimize your wallpapers for your device to achieve the best possible performance. Please choose the performance rating that best represents your device. You can change this selection at a later time and reupload the wallpapers to your device if either the visual quality or performance are not to your liking.
ui_browse_mobile_upload_modal_texture_re: Better Performance - (Reduce textures to half their resolution)
ui_browse_mobile_upload_modal_high_res_i: High resolution wallpapers can be particularly demanding for your mobile device. Try using the Balanced quality option or use the pre-rendered High Performance option if you notice performance issues with this wallpaper.
ui_browse_mobile_upload_modal_pixel_art_: It looks like you are uploading a pixel art wallpaper. It's recommended to use high quality settings for pixel art wallpapers, but if you notice performance issues, please try lowering the quality.
ui_browse_mobile_upload_modal_video_info: Pre-rendering a scene wallpaper can drastically improve performance, but dynamic elements like clocks or interactive touch events will not work.
ui_browse_mobile_upload_modal_export_inf: Tip: Connect your Android Device to Wallpaper Engine to wirelessly transfer your wallpapers to your phone without having to export them first: Click here to learn more.
ui_browse_mobile_firewall_warning: Your Windows firewall may be preventing pairing with your mobile device.
ui_browse_mobile_upload_size_warning_mes: Wallpapers larger than 4GB can currently not be transferred to mobile devices.
ui_browse_mobile_upload_modal_outdated_d: Some wallpapers cannot be uploaded to the mobile app because it is out of date.
The following wallpapers require the latest mobile app version and will be skipped:
All selected wallpapers cannot be uploaded to the mobile app because it is out of date.

Please update the mobile app so it supports the latest Wallpaper Engine features.

Please note that some mobile app stores take a couple of days to publish app updates to all users. If your app store has not yet made the update available to you, please be patient and check again later.
ui_browse_mobile_upload_cancel_body: Are you sure that you want to cancel all pending uploads to your mobile device?
ui_browse_mobile_upload_unavailable_body: Please restart Wallpaper Engine over Steam to install the mobile upload system for the Wallpaper Engine Companion App for Android.
ui_browse_mobile_transcoder_error_failed: Failed converting the wallpaper to a video.
ui_browse_mobile_modal_delete_device_mes: Are you sure you want to unpair {{device}}?
ui_browse_mobile_modal_author_permission:
The wallpaper cannot be exported to your mobile device because the wallpaper creator has to accept the latest Steam Workshop Subscriber Agreement first.

You can send the following link to the creator and ask them to review and accept the latest agreement, afterwards the wallpaper will become available for mobile devices:
The Steam Workshop Subscriber Agreement has been updated to support the usage of wallpapers on mobile devices. Please review and accept the new agreement on the Steam website:
ui_settings_gfx_fps_warning: High FPS may slow down your PC!
ui_settings_gfx_fps_warning_high: High FPS may slow down your PC! We're serious, this is too much 🔥.
ui_settings_gfx_tooltip_warn_post_proces: Ultra mode adds HDR bloom to supported wallpapers and is only recommended for powerful high-end desktop graphics cards.
ui_settings_gfx_tooltip_warn_msaa: x8 MSAA is only recommended for powerful high-end desktop graphics cards.
ui_settings_seasonal_theme_hint: Changes the theme during special times of the year.
ui_settings_hotkeys_group_wallpaper_stub: You can assign hotkeys to wallpapers, playlists or profiles in the wallpaper browser.
ui_settings_hotkeys_modal_prompt_overrid: This key is already assigned to '{{action}}'. Do you want to assign it here instead?
ui_settings_hotkeys_example:
Hotkeys must contain Ctrl, Shift, Alt. Examples:

Shift + Ctrl + B
Shift + F1

A red border means that your hotkey is not valid.
ui_settings_adjust_windows_color_light_t: You are using the Windows 'light' theme which does not allow colors on the task bar. To be able to change the color of your task bar, change the Windows theme to 'dark'.
ui_settings_adjust_windows_color_warning:
IMPORTANT: Please be aware that enabling this feature will modify the look and feel of your Windows. Wallpaper Engine is not able to revert back to your current theme. If you wish to revert to your old design, you need to manually change your Windows Theme color settings.

If you don't know how to do that or if you use an unactivated version of Windows that doesn't allow you to do that, please DO NOT enable this feature!

The colors cannot be reverted by Wallpaper Engine. They can be reverted in the Windows settings instead.
ui_settings_advanced_unpause_during_aero: Enabling this option will unpause Wallpaper Engine when any translucent Windows elements overlay the desktop, including the fullscreen start menu, the Windows task view switcher or while using Alt + Tab.
ui_settings_advanced_mini_mode_minimize: Hide other applications in mini mode:
ui_settings_advanced_high_precision_time: Enabling high-precision timers will reduce stuttering in scene wallpapers and provide more consistent and precise FPS. It may also impact power and CPU usage, therefore the effect will be reduced on laptops to consume less power while running on battery.
ui_settings_plugins_options_delay_load_h:
You can use this option to delay the loading of all plugins. This can be useful if you are having issues with plugins after starting your system when Wallpaper Engine starts up faster than other programs or drivers on your computer.

For example, if the hardware LED effects do not work correctly after starting your system, set this option to 60 or 120 seconds and see if that allows the LED plugin to work correctly. Higher numbers are safer but also mean a longer delay until plugins take effect after your system starts.
ui_settings_plugins_options_led_plugin_d: Controls LED effects from Corsair and Razer devices.
ui_settings_advanced_reset_config_modal_: The entire application will be reset, all of your settings will be removed and Wallpaper Engine needs to restart.
ui_settings_advanced_monitor_identificat:
This setting controls how Wallpaper Engine assigns wallpapers to individual screens. If you have any issues with wallpapers being swapped between monitors or wallpapers not showing up after restarting or hibernating your PC, try changing this option. Due to the variety of issues in graphics drivers and Windows itself, there is no generally recommended setting and you may need to try multiple options.

Device Path
This assigns wallpapers directly to the name of the graphics card adapter and the name of the monitor. If you change the graphics card cables or change your screen, the wallpaper has to be selected for the new configuration again. However, you can change the multi-monitor layout or the primary monitor and the wallpapers will stay where you assigned them. This is a stable and the recommended method. You will not have problems with this unless your graphics driver has severe issues.

Shell API
This method is the most modern approach for detecting screens introduced in Windows 10. If you are having issues with your monitor identification, try using this method first.

Layout
This orders the monitors based on their virtual position in Windows. If you change the multi-monitor layout, change your primary monitor, or remove monitors then the program may not restore the wallpapers the way you expect. You should use this option only if your driver gives you too many problems with the default 'Device Path' option and if you do not change your monitors regularly.

GDI
Identify monitors based on how Windows orders and names them. If this option works for you, you will be able to restore the same wallpaper to every monitor even if you replace the monitors themselves but keep their general position. Has a high probability of swapping wallpapers randomly every time you start the PC or resume from sleep - for many people this is relatively prone to errors and won't work well.

Deprecated
Similar to the 'GDI' option which uses an older method of identifying monitors. It is generally the most error-prone option but in rare cases it may solve Windows or graphics card driver-related issues. Only try this as a last resort.
ui_settings_advanced_sleep_hack_tip:
Use this option if you have any compatibility issues after Windows hibernation. This will make the program fully restart after hibernation to fix issues caused by other programs on the computer.

Fix crash after hibernation
If Wallpaper Engine crashes after hibernation, then Windows is not correctly restoring the graphics driver and Wallpaper Engine in order. This option may help on your system to fix this.

Fix LED effects after hibernation
Some LED utilities may block the connection to Wallpaper Engine after hibernation and the LED effects will stop working. This option may help fixing this by fully restarting Wallpaper Engine and making it reconnect to the LED utilities.
ui_settings_advanced_sleep_hack_error_au: You need to enable the auto start option with high priority at the top of this page before you can use this.
ui_settings_advanced_sleep_hack_enable_w:
Only use this option if you experience issues with Wallpaper Engine after hibernation.

This option is only required if something causes Wallpaper Engine to stop working properly after hibernation and it will make it restart every time you set Windows to hibernate.
ui_settings_advanced_restart_setting_mod: The program needs to be restarted to apply the settings. Restart now?
ui_settings_use_safe_mode_hint:
This option will stop Wallpaper Engine from loading the currently selected wallpapers after a crash.

If the wallpaper files downloaded by Steam are broken or there is an issue with a core component of your operating system, this option can help you to remove the broken wallpaper and switch to a working one.

In general there is no need to disable this option. If you have persistent hardware or driver problems that make program crashes inevitable, you can disable this and Wallpaper Engine will then load the last wallpapers even after a crash.
ui_settings_disable_slideshow_tip: When this option is enabled, Wallpaper Engine will attempt to remove the wallpaper fade effect that Windows uses by default when switching Windows wallpapers and when logging into Windows. Removing this Windows behavior is not perfectly possible and the fade effect may still flash up for a brief moment.
ui_settings_restart_after_crash_hint:
This option will make Wallpaper Engine immediately restart itself after it crashed and it will disable crash notifications in the main application.

You should absolutely not enable this option unless you have no other choice.

Wallpaper Engine itself is very stable and should not crash under normal circumstances. This option solely exists to combat crashes on unstable systems due to faulty graphics drivers or aggressive software that makes Wallpaper Engine helplessly crash.

You can interrupt the automatic restart by holding the ESCAPE key down.
ui_settings_enable_override_system_image: Override Windows Wallpaper or Lockscreen Image

Please create a backup of your Windows wallpaper and lockscreen image before enabling this option.

Wallpaper Engine will attempt to restore the image when you disable these options again automatically, but you should still make sure you have a backup of your Windows wallpaper and lockscreen in case they cannot be restored.
ui_settings_restore_override_wallpaper_m: You are disabling the Windows wallpaper image override option. Would you like to restore the Windows wallpaper image that Wallpaper Engine saved when you first enabled this option?
ui_settings_restore_override_lockscreen_: You are disabling the Windows lockscreen image override option. Would you like to restore the Windows lockscreen image that Wallpaper Engine saved when you first enabled this option?
ui_settings_enable_vdesktop_support_hint:
Experimental

This option will allow you to set different wallpapers per virtual desktop. Virtual desktop support requires Windows 10 (21H2 update or newer) or Windows 11.

Windows 11 notice: Microsoft is still working on new virtual desktop features on Windows 11. This means you should expect issues to occur with upcoming Windows updates that will need to be resolved by a Wallpaper Engine update. Please note that we cannot provide updates for issues as part of test versions of Windows (Windows Insider Preview) since Microsoft changes them frequently.
The transitional effect when switching virtual desktops is handled internally by Windows and it is not possible for Wallpaper Engine to display both wallpapers properly during a transition.

While this is still an experimental feature and in on-going development by Microsoft on Windows 11, if Wallpaper Engine crashes, this option will be disabled automatically and you need to re-enable it.

Unsupported build version: {{version}}.
Windows {{windows}} must be updated to version {{buildneeded}} or newer.
ui_settings_enable_media_integration_sup:
Allows wallpapers to read the title, artist and album cover of the currently playing music.

This feature will work with all music players that support the Windows media overlay.
ui_settings_highpriority_warning:
High priority mode will launch the application more quickly using a 'Windows service'. But if you are experiencing issues with this solution, try it without high priority, which will be more reliable but slower.

This option will also make the program auto start for all Windows accounts on this PC.
ui_welcome_intro: This is a short introduction to get you started and to configure a few important options for you. Everything you adjust here can also be changed in the Wallpaper Engine settings at a later time!
ui_welcome_quality_column_header: Select overall wallpaper quality, you can still change this later:
ui_welcome_windows_color_description: Let wallpapers adjust your Windows border color automatically:
ui_welcome_use_dark_theme_description: Use a dark theme for the program:
ui_welcome_autostart_description: Show animated wallpapers when Windows starts by quietly launching Wallpaper Engine in the background when your computer starts (recommended):
ui_welcome_finish_body:
Everything is set up!

Wallpaper Engine is now available in your system tray. Double-click to select a wallpaper or right-click to access the settings, the Steam Workshop or the Wallpaper Editor.
ui_welcome_use_led_effects_description: Enabling this option will sync the colors of wallpapers with compatible Razer Chroma and Corsair iCUE devices.
ui_editor_modal_duplicate_texture_body:
This will duplicate the texture, so you can modify it on this layer without affecting other layers that use this same texture.

This is can be useful if you have previously duplicated the whole layer or the effect, but keep in mind that this will increase the required memory of the wallpaper too.
ui_editor_modal_video_file_invalid_body:
The selected video file {{file}} is too large. You can only upload videos to Workshop that are smaller than {{size}}.

This restriction is only for the Workshop, you can of course still use this video as a wallpaper for yourself by simply dragging it into the wallpaper browser or clicking Open Wallpaper in the browser.
ui_editor_modal_project_files_invalid_bo:
The selected project files are too large. You can only upload a project to the Workshop that is smaller than {{size}}.

This restriction is only for the Workshop, you can of course still use this project as a wallpaper for yourself by simply dragging it into the wallpaper browser or clicking Open Wallpaper in the browser.
ui_editor_modal_project_files_invalid_to: You can only upload a project to the Workshop that is smaller than {{size}}.
ui_editor_modal_limit_error_shadow_spot_: Too many Spot Lights with Shadows
Only {{limit}} shadow mapped spot lights can be used at the same time.
ui_editor_modal_limit_error_cookie_spot_: Too many Spot Lights with Projected Textures
Only {{limit}} spot light with a projected texture can be used at the same time.
ui_editor_modal_limit_error_shadow_direc: Too many Lights with Cascaded Shadow Maps
Only {{limit}} light with a cascaded (directional) shadow map can be used at the same time.
ui_editor_delete_project_modal_body:
Are you sure that you want to permanently delete the project:
{{title}} ?

You will not be able to update or use this project after deleting it.
ui_editor_no_animation_modal_body:
It looks like you are trying to upload a scene wallpaper without animation. This is not recommended.

Wallpaper Engine is optimized for animated wallpapers, so if you only want to use a static image, it is advisable to use your operating system in that case.

Do you want to continue anyway?
ui_editor_review_info_body:
In some cases, your wallpaper may be marked for review before other users can find and download it to ensure that it does not violate Steam rules. Please be patient, there is no need to delete your wallpaper.

If you update or reupload your wallpaper, it has to be reviewed again and is pushed to the back of the queue.
ui_editor_workshop_eula_body: Please review and accept the latest Steam Workshop Subscriber Agreement on before you can continue with the upload process of your wallpaper:
ui_editor_workshop_eula_waiting_hint: Waiting for EULA to be accepted
ui_editor_modal_unsaved_changes_body: You have unsaved changes in your project. Would you like to save or discard them now?
ui_editor_modal_delete_published_wallpap: Any Workshop uploads you delete from this list will be deleted from the Steam Workshop entirely. All contents will also be deleted from every user who has subscribed to it via Steam.

Are you sure that you want to permanently delete {{title}} from the Steam Workshop?

The Workshop upload will be permanently deleted from the Steam Workshop and for every user who has subscribed to it.
ui_editor_modal_dlc_prompt_message_offli:
This advanced functionality is part of the free {{name}} DLC, which requires {{size}} of disk space.

Please start Steam and restart Wallpaper Engine in order to download it.
ui_editor_modal_dlc_prompt_message_ask_d:
This advanced functionality is part of the free {{name}} DLC, which requires {{size}} of disk space.

Should Steam download it now?
ui_editor_modal_dlc_prompt_message_ask_m: This advanced functionality is part of the free {{name}} DLC, please download it through Steam in order to use it.
ui_editor_modal_dlc_prompt_message_progr: Please wait for the {{name}} DLC to finish downloading.
ui_editor_modal_dlc_prompt_cancel_downlo: Do you want to cancel the download of the {{name}} DLC?
ui_editor_camera_select_path: Please select a path on the left.
ui_editor_welcome_modal_hint_text: New to Wallpaper Engine? Be sure to check out the official designer documentation for extensive guides and useful tips:
ui_editor_welcome_modal_hint_backup_text: Tip: Back up your project files when switching computers!
ui_editor_welcome_modal_resize_alert: Your image has a resolution of {{width}} x {{height}} pixels which is not a common display resolution. It's recommended to let Wallpaper Engine resize the image for you.
ui_editor_welcome_modal_resize_alert_por: Your image is a portrait image with a resolution of {{width}} x {{height}} pixels. Unless you have a portrait monitor, a lot of the image will be cut off.
ui_editor_importer_crop_transparency_hel:
The transparent area will be cropped and your image will be resized to improve performance.

If you update your image later, make sure to not shrink or extend the transparent area, since that could cause issues with existing effects that you have added.
ui_editor_importer_crop_transparency_war: It looks like the transparent area of the image changed. If you have any effects on this image already you might have to fix them if you continue to import this image.
ui_editor_importer_gif_warning_body:
The GIF you are trying to import occupies a lot of memory when converted into a more usable format. Wallpaper Engine can try to convert it anyway, but the process might fail with an error.

The GIF format is generally unsuitable for high resolution images and/or a lot of frames, you should consider using an .mp4 video wallpaper because that would perform better.
ui_editor_publish_modal_steam_error:
Steam has encountered the following error:

{{error}}

Make sure no firewall or antivirus app is interfering with Steam. Restart Steam and try again later in case there are temporary server or network issues.
ui_editor_publish_modal_publish_prompt_a: You need to accept the Steam Workshop agreement before your wallpaper will be visible to others. View your wallpaper on the Steam Workshop now:
ui_editor_publish_modal_progress_uploadi: Submitting Workshop item, uploading preview image...
ui_editor_publish_modal_snapshot_resolut: Please use a preview image that is no larger than {{size}} pixels.
ui_editor_publish_modal_video_invalid: Video format cannot be played correctly. Change the format and restart the editor.
ui_editor_publish_modal_info_asset_reuse: By uploading an asset to the Steam Workshop, you agree that other users may re-use and possibly re-upload modified versions of your asset without notice to you. Deleted assets will still persist in already created wallpapers.
ui_editor_publish_assets_modal_header_al: You are about to publish an Asset, not a wallpaper. Please do not publish whole wallpapers with this menu. If you want to publish a wallpaper, click this message.
ui_editor_publish_assets_modal_select_as: Please choose what kind of assets you would like to share on the Workshop:
Publish as asset pack. Users will be able to import each layer separately.
ui_editor_publish_assets_modal_select_la: Select the layers that you would like to share:
There are no eligible layers to choose for sharing.
ui_editor_publish_assets_modal_select_ef: Select the effect that you would like to share:
There are no eligible effects to choose for sharing.
ui_editor_warn_advanced_assets_creation_:
This option should only be used by advanced users who are familiar with the editor and have published a few Scene wallpapers before.

Enabling this will add buttons to the editor that allow you to create new single assets to be shared on the Workshop for others to re-use in their own wallpapers.
ui_editor_warn_puppet_editor_version_mis: This puppet was created with a different version of the Wallpaper Engine Editor. You have to revert to an older version of the Wallpaper Engine Editor on Steam to edit this puppet.

This puppet was created with a different version of the Wallpaper Engine Editor and needs to be converted before it can be edited again.

Please make a backup of your wallpaper project using the Save as option in the file menu first, then click OK to convert it.
ui_editor_effect_list_modal_create_new_e:
You are about to create a new, editable effect. You can change the shaders in any way you like.

Choose a unique name for the new effect:
ui_editor_effect_list_modal_create_dupli:
You are about to duplicate the effect '{{effect}}' and create a new, editable effect where you can change the shaders in any way you like.

Choose a unique name for the new effect:
ui_editor_effect_list_modal_delete_effec:
Are you sure that you want to delete the effect '{{effect}}'?

This will break all usages of that effect inside the wallpaper and this cannot be undone!
ui_editor_workshop_modal_rating_no_ratin: Please make sure that any content you upload is suitable for everyone! If you upload anything questionable or illegal, your submission or your entire account may be banned.
ui_editor_workshop_modal_rating_body_ste: Please make sure that your upload adheres to the Steam Workshop content rules.
ui_editor_workshop_modal_rating_body_ins: Select the appropriate content categories for your wallpaper. Purposefully selecting the wrong content settings for your wallpaper may result in your content being removed and an account ban.
ui_editor_workshop_modal_rating_header_v: Severe displays of non-real gore and violence
ui_editor_workshop_modal_rating_body_vio: Cases such as characters holding weapons do not count as displays of violence and do not need to be marked.
ui_editor_workshop_modal_rating_body_sex: Real displays of sexual content are strictly forbidden.

Mild nudity: Your wallpaper contains mild cases of partial nudity or other mildly sexual themes.</br>Full nudity: Your wallpaper contains nude characters or other predominantly sexual themes.</br>Adult content: Your wallpaper features sexual acts or sexual content that is for adults only.
ui_editor_generic_modal_enter_layer_posi: Move this layer to a new position between the top (1) or the bottom ({{last}}) of the list.
ui_editor_generic_modal_hierarchy_error_: You cannot nest more than {{count}} composition layers consecutively as children.
ui_editor_animation_modal_loop_wrap_help: Sets the last frame of the animation equal to the first frame, resulting in a smooth loop that ends exactly where it starts.
ui_editor_animation_toggle_bezier: Toggle Bézier interpolation at keyframe (none, automatic, left, right, both)
ui_editor_animation_help_modal_lock_poin: Lock points vertically while moving them.
ui_editor_animation_help_modal_zoom: Use the mouse wheel to zoom. Hold down SHIFT or CTRL to zoom vertically.
ui_editor_animation_help_modal_select_po: Click points to select them. Hold down SHIFT or CTRL to select mutiple points or draw a rectangle with the mouse button.
ui_editor_animation_help_modal_copy_past: Use CTRL + C or V to copy or paste all selected points.
ui_editor_animation_help_modal_delete: Press DEL to delete all selected points.
ui_editor_animation_help_modal_autokeyfr: Press A to toggle auto-keyframing on or off.
ui_editor_animation_help_modal_keyframe: Press K to insert or remove keyframes at the current point in time.
ui_editor_animation_help_modal_update_ke: Press U to update an existing keyframe at the current point in time (only when auto keyframing is disabled).
ui_editor_animation_help_modal_jump_fram: Press LEFT or RIGHT to go one frame to the left or right.
ui_editor_animation_help_modal_jump_keyf: Press CTRL together with LEFT or RIGHT to go to the next or previous keyframe.
ui_editor_animation_help_modal_play_paus: Press SPACE to play or pause the animation.
ui_editor_bone_constraints_ik_end_bone_r: The last bone will rotate to point towards the target controller when the chain is fully stretched out. Rotate the bone so the x-axis (the red arrow) points towards the forward direction of the limb to adjust this alignment.
ui_editor_bone_constraints_blending_hint: Match bone transforms with another bone dynamically during animation.
ui_editor_character_separation_analyzer_: Higher values increase quality slightly but significantly increase time to recalculate.
ui_editor_character_separation_modal_res: Are you sure that you want to reset the entire mask?
ui_editor_character_separation_modal_con:
The existing image layer will be replaced with the new background image and a new layer with the foreground image will be added.

This cannot be undone.

Do you want to continue?
ui_editor_character_separation_hierarchy: Are you sure that you want to remove the limb {{name}}?
ui_editor_character_separation_modal_con:
The existing layer will be removed along with any effects or settings and a new texture with the character sheet for puppet warp will be imported.

This cannot be undone.

Do you want to continue?
ui_editor_character_separation_outline_c: Increase outline compensation slightly to reduce distortion at the border of characters and small objects. This works especially well on hand-drawn content.
ui_editor_character_separation_disabled_:
This functionality is not available on image layers with existing effects.

Please either remove all image effects from this layer or re-import a copy of this image with a different name, then try again.
ui_editor_character_separation_not_image:
This functionality is only available on image layers.

Please select an image layer to continue.
ui_editor_character_separation_hint: Tip: Only draw rough outlines of the foreground and background. Pixel-perfect outlines will not improve the result. Click Help for more information.
ui_editor_character_separation_cancel_ed: Do you want to cancel and discard the mask?
ui_editor_character_separation_hierarchy: Are you sure that you want to remove the texture channel {{name}}?
ui_editor_character_separation_alpha_wri:
Allows you to add new elements in translucent spaces.

If you have overlapping texture channels, disabling alpha writing improves how they blend together.
You have overlapping texture channels which may render incorrectly when alpha writing is enabled and they are both active.
ui_editor_character_separation_texture_c: A texture channel must have the same resolution as the puppet. Please import a texture that is exactly {{width}} pixels wide and {{height}} pixels tall.
Texture channel editing is unavailable on puppets that use a GIF or a video texture for the puppet image.
Too much texture data. Reduce number of channels, resolution or texture changes.
ui_editor_export_modal_audio_hint:
This tool allows you to export a video without audio or interactive elements of the wallpaper.

If you want to record audio or interactive elements as well please follow this guide: help.wallpaperengine.io.
ui_editor_settings_auto_saving_hint: General project settings and certain assets like textures and puppets will still be saved automatically.
ui_editor_external_app_not_found_body:
The external program {{name}} has not been found.

Please install {{name}} and select it in Wallpaper Engine. See here for more information about support for external programs in Wallpaper Engine: help.wallpaperengine.io
ui_editor_external_custom_image_editor_n:
Please select an image editor of your choice. This allows you to conveniently edit image layers and effect masks in an external image editing tool. Changes you make will be automatically re-imported into Wallpaper Engine when using the quick save functionality of your image editor.

View our designer documentation for additional information about external image editor support in Wallpaper Engine: External Image Editor Support
ui_editor_user_properties_select_info: Choose a property with a compatible type ({{types}}).
ui_editor_user_properties_select_unused_: This property is not being used by the wallpaper. If you are using it as part of SceneScript, you can ignore this warning.
ui_editor_user_properties_combo_value: Selected combo value for this link:
ui_editor_user_properties_delete_warning:
If you remove an existing property from a published wallpaper, you will break any settings and presets that other users have already created from your wallpaper.

We strongly recommend against this unless you have only published the wallpaper very recently or if you are removing a user property that was unused previously.
ui_editor_clean_project_modal_hint: The following assets appear to be unused by your project and may be deleted to reduce disk space. Please double check the list of files to be deleted below before continuing.
ui_editor_clean_project_modal_info: The files will be moved into the recycle bin and can be restored from there if necessary.
ui_editor_snapshot_instructions:
1. Draw a rectangle with the mouse.
2. Press enter to take a snapshot.

Press Space to pause.
Press S to skip 10 seconds ahead.
{{mode}}
Press Escape to cancel.
ui_editor_snapshot_instructions_overlay: Press O to choose a transparent overlay image.{{clearimg}}
ui_editor_snapshot_instructions_overlay_: Press X to clear overlay image.
ui_editor_snapshot_instructions_img_mode:
Press G to enter GIF recording mode.
{{overlay}}
ui_editor_snapshot_instructions_gif_pend:
Encoding GIF, please wait.
This process can take a while.

Shrinking GIF for compatibility with Steam, please wait.
This process can take a while.
ui_editor_snapshot_instructions_hdr_warn:
WARNING: It looks like you have Windows HDR enabled.

Unfortunately modern Windows screen recording functions result in bright images
when HDR is enabled. This is a bug in Windows that Microsoft needs to fix.
If the GIF is too bright, then that is not something Wallpaper Engine can resolve for now.
ui_editor_workshop_rules_modal_body: Before submitting your wallpaper to the Workshop, make sure that it does not violate the Steam Terms of Service, otherwise it will be removed:
ui_editor_workshop_rules_modal_list_head: In particular, the following rules exist for wallpapers, the preview image and description:
ui_editor_workshop_rules_modal_rule_nudi: No photographic/real life pornography or nudity
ui_workshop_info_visibility_public: Public wallpapers appear in the public search results and can be used by anyone.
ui_workshop_info_visibility_friends: Friends-only wallpapers can only be found and downloaded by friends.
ui_workshop_info_visibility_private: Private wallpapers are only visible to you and cannot be downloaded by anyone else.
ui_workshop_info_visibility_unlisted: Unlisted wallpapers can be downloaded by anyone with the link, but they cannot be found through the search.
ui_editor_scene_options_bloom_hint: Please note: Bloom effects require post-processing to be enabled in Wallpaper Engine performance settings.
ui_editor_scene_options_bloom_hdr_settin: You should test standard and HDR bloom to ensure the wallpaper looks good for everyone.
ui_editor_effects_modal_imagelayer_descr: Import an image from your computer.
ui_editor_effects_modal_fullscreenlayer_:
Add a translucent layer that covers the entire screen. Any effects applied to this layer will affect objects that have been drawn to the screen before this layer.

This layer will always be aligned to the screen and will not move with the wallpaper. It should be used for fullscreen effects that don't require precise alignment or masks, to get the best quality independent of screen size.
ui_editor_effects_modal_projectlayer_des:
Add a translucent layer that automatically covers the entire wallpaper. Any effects applied to this layer will affect objects that have been drawn before this layer.

This layer requires more performance than the post-processing layer and should only be used if you want to align fullscreen effects accurately with the wallpaper, independent from the wallpaper alignment or screen size.
ui_editor_effects_modal_solidlayer_descr: Adds a solid layer with a background of a single color. Can be used in combination with other effects.
ui_editor_effects_modal_replaceablesolid: Adds a solid layer with a background of a simple color that can be replaced dynamically with a user texture or album cover. Can be used in combination with other effects.
ui_editor_effects_modal_composelayer_des: Add a translucent layer of specific size. Attach other objects as children to this layer to combine them into a single texture which you can apply effects to.
ui_editor_effects_modal_transform_descri: An empty layer that other layers can be attached to.
ui_editor_effects_modal_model_descriptio: Import a 3D model from your computer.
ui_editor_effects_modal_particle_system_: Create a new particle effect from scratch.
ui_editor_effects_modal_sound_descriptio: Add looping background music or randomly playing ambient sounds.
ui_editor_effects_modal_light_descriptio: Add a light to the scene. Only affects images with lighting enabled or 3D models.
ui_editor_effects_modal_camera_descripti: Add a camera to the scene. This allows you define camera motion paths, especially useful in 3D scenes.
ui_editor_effects_modal_postprocessing_c: Use this layer to render certain built-in post-processing effects of Wallpaper Engine before some of your own layers.
ui_editor_effects_modal_compatibility_wa:
You are about to import an effect with a newer version than used by this project. This may result in all instances of this effect being reset and you will lose their settings.

This is not reversible and your old settings will be lost. You may want to make a backup of the project before proceeding.

Do you want to continue?
ui_editor_effect_blend_description: Blend two images or image layers with various blend modes.
ui_editor_effect_blend_gradient_descript: Blend two images together, modulated by a gradient mask.
ui_editor_effect_blur_description: Apply coarse gaussian blur to the image. Supports an optional mask.
ui_editor_effect_blur_precise_descriptio: Apply gaussian blur to the image in full resolution. Supports an optional mask.
ui_editor_effect_blur_radial_description: Apply radial blur to the entire image. Supports an optional mask.
ui_editor_effect_color_key_description: Mask a part of the image that matches a color of choice.
ui_editor_effect_edge_detection_descript: Detects edges of the image using the sobel filter.
ui_editor_effect_foliage_sway_descriptio: Sways the object in each corner of the image.
ui_editor_effect_godrays_description: Add directional or circular god rays.
ui_editor_effect_local_contrast_descript: Apply a local contrast enhancement to the image.
ui_editor_effect_motion_blur_description: Accumulates the image over time to create a motion blur effect.
ui_editor_effect_opacity_description: Adds an opacity mask to the image.
ui_editor_effect_pulse_description: Add flickering and pulsating light effects to the image.
ui_editor_effect_reflection_description: Adds a reflection effect to the image. Draw a mask to define where the reflection should appear.
ui_editor_effect_scroll_description: Scrolls the image horizontally or vertically.
ui_editor_effect_shake_description: Adds a shake animation. Only masked areas will be affected. Rigid and smooth animations can be achieved.
ui_editor_effect_tint_description: Tint the image with a color of choice.
ui_editor_effect_transform_description: Apply scaling, rotation and offsets to the image.
ui_editor_effect_vhs_description: Distortion and colorization of an old video tape.
ui_editor_effect_water_flow_description: Adds a flow animation. The direction can be controlled with a flow mask that you can paint in the editor.
ui_editor_effect_water_ripple_descriptio: Adds a ripple animation. Draw a mask to limit the animation to a specific area of the image.
ui_editor_effect_water_waves_description: Adds a simple wave effect using sines.
ui_editor_effect_fire_description: Adds a fire stream to the image. Color can be freely modified.
ui_editor_effect_xray_description: Blends between two images based on cursor position.
ui_editor_effect_shine_description: Applies a shine effect to bright parts of the image with a variable number of edges.
ui_editor_effect_refract_description: Distorts the background based on a normal map, allows blending with an optional albedo texture too.
ui_editor_effect_iris_description: Animates the eyes of a character to look around realistically.
ui_editor_effect_depth_parallax_descript:
This effect requires the parallax option in the editor scene settings to be enabled!

Applies a parallax image displacement based on a depth map that you can generate automatically, draw or import.
ui_editor_effect_swing_description: Swings an object back and forth in perspective.
ui_editor_effect_twirl_description: Applies an animated spiral distortion to the image.
ui_editor_effect_cursor_ripple_descripti: Applies a ripple effect where the cursor is moving.
ui_editor_effect_advanced_fluid_simulati: Realistic fluid and smoke simulation with multiple mask and emission options.
ui_editor_effect_chromatic_abberation_de: Chromatic image distortion with different colors and directions.
ui_editor_effect_light_shafts_descriptio: Add image-based light shafts with perspective support and multiple shapes.
ui_editor_preset_light_shafts_descriptio: Adds light shafts to the wallpaper.
ui_editor_preset_snow_particles_descript: Adds snow particles slowly falling from the top of the screen.
ui_editor_preset_rain_description: Adds rain particles. Optionally with refraction/distortion of the background image.
ui_editor_preset_interactive_description: Interactive particles that are affected by the cursor.
ui_editor_preset_clock_description: Insert a clock into your scene.
ui_editor_preset_countdown_description: Insert a countdown into your scene.
ui_editor_script_unsaved_changes_body: There are unsaved changes. Do you want to keep them?
ui_editor_script_workshop_browse_empty: Empty - subscribe to scripts on Workshop
ui_editor_properties_alert_message_pivot: Rotate and move the puppet with ALT + left/right click
While painting, rotate and move the puppet with ALT + left/right click
ui_editor_properties_attachments_info: First select a bone, then click anywhere to create an attachment point.
ui_editor_properties_led_source: Limit iCUE & Chroma to this layer
ui_editor_properties_lock_geometry_verte:
Convert the procedurally generated geometry to a fixed mesh that you can directly edit.

This allows you to make precise adjustments to each vertex, but you will not be able to edit any of the previous controls on this page unless you unlock the geometry and undo any direct adjustments you made.

Locking the puppet geometry will enable blend shape editing, allowing you to animate details like facial expressions.

The subdivison option is set too high, try setting it to 2 or lower.

Vertex editing is more effective with a lower subdivision number, otherwise you will have to remove a lot of vertices before being able to place new ones sensibly.

Do you still want to continue?
The puppet model has too many vertices for manual editing. Try reducing the subdivision option first.
ui_editor_properties_reset_all_weights_m: Are you sure that you want to reset all vertex weights to their defaults?
ui_editor_properties_select_parent_bone: Select a parent bone to link to.
ui_editor_properties_unlock_geometry_ver: Permanently delete all direct vertex modifications, expressions and vertex deformations and return to procedurally generated geometry mode.
ui_editor_properties_update_bone_mask_in: Select the bones that should be part of this animation.
ui_editor_properties_context_menu_bind_a: There are no attachments in the scene. Create an attachment on a puppet warp or 3D model first.
Choose an attachment to follow. This will replace the current script on the property.
ui_editor_particle_delete_particle_body: Are you sure you want to delete the particle system {{particle}}?
ui_editor_particle_duplicate_particle_bo: Enter the name of the new particle system:
ui_editor_particle_new_particle_body: Enter the name of the new particle system:
ui_editor_particle_add_element_emitter_b: Select an emitter that creates new particles.
ui_editor_particle_add_element_initializ: Select an initializer that is applied when a particle spawns.
ui_editor_particle_add_element_operator_: Select an operator that simulates the particle over time.
ui_editor_particle_add_element_renderer_: Select a renderer that controls the way particles are displayed.
ui_editor_particle_add_element_children_: Select an existing particle system as a child.
ui_editor_properties_geometry_warning_bo:
This image is not suitable for the puppet warp animation system.

You should import an image/character that has a transparent background in order for puppet warp to work correctly.

You can either have each limb/animated part as a separate object on the image, or just cut the character/object out of the image and make the background fully transparent.
ui_editor_puppet_warp_edit_warning_body:
If you continue to edit this creation stage of the puppet warp, you will reset all following creation stages and have to re-do them from scratch.
All existing animations for this puppet will be deleted.
ui_editor_puppet_warp_delete_warning_bod:
Are you sure that you want to delete this puppet warp model and all its animations?

This action cannot be undone.

The puppet warp will be deleted from all layers that are using this image.
ui_provider_error_logged_on_elsewhere: Steam user is logged on a different computer.
ui_provider_error_file_not_found: Steam could not find or access certain files on your hard disk.
ui_provider_error_servers_busy: Steam's servers are unresponsive and may be overloaded or down entirely.
ui_provider_error_access_denied: Steam is denying access. This usually means your account is banned or temporarily restricted.
ui_provider_error_timeout: Steam aborted the request since it took too much time to process.
ui_provider_error_not_logged_in: Steam user is not logged in.
ui_provider_error_limit_exceeded: Steam has encountered a request limit.
ui_provider_error_io_failure: Steam has run into problems reading or writing files to and from your hard disk.
ui_provider_error_read_only: Steam service is read-only. If you changed your password recently, Steam does not allow uploading new content. This problem usually resolves itself after a few days.
ui_provider_error_failed_setting_item_da: Steam failed applying new Workshop information.
ui_provider_error_ctx_create_ugc_rate_li: Steam has rejected your Workshop submission because you are uploading too often. Please try again in a few minutes.
ui_resourcecompiler_error_texture_cannot: FreeImage failed to decode the image
ui_resourcecompiler_error_texture_not_po: Texture size is not a power of 2
ui_resourcecompiler_error_texture_too_la: Texture is too large (max size is {{maxTextureSize}} x {{maxTextureSize}})
ui_resourcecompiler_error_texture_layout: Failed to create sprite sheet (GIF too large?)
Failed to create sprite sheet because images have different resolutions
ui_resourcecompiler_error_model_no_mater: Model file is missing some materials (or missing mtl file)
ui_resourcecompiler_error_model_too_many: Model has too many unique vertices (max is {{maxVertices}})
ui_resourcecompiler_error_model_inconsis: Model has an inconsistent number of vertices
Model has an inconsistent number of texture coordinates
Model has an inconsistent number of normals
Model has inconsistent blend weight data
ui_resourcecompiler_error_assimp_missing: Model is missing a second UV channel
ui_resourcecompiler_error_puppet_wrong_e: Puppet model requires a different version of the Wallpaper Engine Editor to compile.
ui_resourcecompiler_error_model_too_many: Model has too many bones (max is {{maxBones}})
Model has too many morph animations (max is {{maxMorphAnim}})
Model has too many morphed vertices (max is {{maxMorphVertices}})
ui_resourcecompiler_warning_texture_crop: Your texture has been cropped to fit the recommended resolution
ui_win32_slideshow_compat_modal_body:
It looks like you are using a Slideshow or Windows Spotlight as your Windows wallpaper. This will cause your Windows wallpaper to appear periodically in front of Wallpaper Engine.

Please choose a static picture or color as your Windows wallpaper in the Windows personalization settings to resolve this issue.
ui_windows_insider_warning: Windows Beta Version detected: You are using an Insider preview release of Windows. If Wallpaper Engine does not work properly for you, switch to a stable version of Windows to fix these issues.
